Raise Ticket

If you did a transaction via DealsnCoupons & did not get the qualifying Sale Profit/Referral amount/Gift Card Cashback, don't worry! Just raise a ticket, Sale Profit/Referral/Gift Card Cashback ticket & our team will escalate your transaction to the retailer. Please note that retailers only accept Missing Sale Profit/Referral claims for the last 10 days.

More Details

  • Retailers do not accept Missing Tickets older than 7 days
  • As these Missing Transactions are dealt with outside the usual payment process, Tickets may take 30-45 days to get resolved and show in your Earnings Account. Consequently confirmation period of Missing Transactions can also take longer than 90 days. Rest assured we will try our best to get your transaction approved as soon as possible. That’s when we earn too, so our incentives are always aligned with yours!
  • Incorrect Information may lead to Cancellation of Sale Profit/Referral. Please do not raise multiple tickets for the same transaction. This may also lead to the Retailer declining the query
  • Please note that sometimes transactions initially track at lower/incorrect amounts and get updated to the right amount at the time of confirmation
  • While we shall try our best to resolve and get your Missing Sale Profit approved, the retailer’s decision is final in this regard
